bill.summary:
Providing Emotional Assistance with Relief and Love Act or the PEARL Act
This bill requires U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP) to establish a pilot program to adopt dogs from local animal shelters to be trained as support dogs for CBPâ€™s Support Canine Program. Support dogs are used for grief assistance, trauma mitigation, and morale.
